title: cintayAmi satatam
sahitya:
cintayAmi satatam shrI muttusvAmi dIkSitam


anupallavi

  antakAri suta mantrOpAsana tatparam AnandAmrta varSaNa kArakam varam 
apAra rAga layAbhigjna rAmasvAmi suputram parama pavitram sucaritram


caraNam    apUrva pancalinga navAvarANAdi daiva parakrti kartAram muraLIrava hitam 
nipuNam gAna nipuNam dEshIya gAna nipuNam mArga dEshIya gAna nipuNam
